text: Gasha (possibly from Quechua kasha thorn or spine) is a mountain in the northern part of the Huayhuash mountain range in the Andes of Peru. It is located in the Ancash Region, Bolognesi Province, Pacllón District, and in the Huánuco Region, Lauricocha Province, Queropalca District.escale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL map of the Cajatambo Province (Lima Region) Gasha lies northwest of Mitococha and north of Paria. ==References== Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Ancash Region Category:Mountains of Huánuco Region
title: Gasha (Peru)
